articles.author: StudyFinds Staff
articles.title: The ‘big head’ people: Scientists uncover a lost human species in Asia - Study Finds
articles.description: Could another group of ancient humans have lived alongside Homo sapiens? A new study suggests that they did, and scientists are starting to piece together the clues of their forgotten past.
articles.content:
A neanderthal skull. (© Vitezslav Halamka - stock.adobe.com)
